1010011101100100 1011010010000010 0 -> sum: 0101101111100110, cout: 1
0111110011100011 1011101110001111 0 -> sum: 0011100001110010, cout: 1
0011010010000110 0000111100111001 1 -> sum: 0100001111000000, cout: 0

0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0

0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0
